237.movie_plot: When a retired engineer is called upon to rescue a failing satellite, he insists that his equally old teammates accompany him into space.

111.movie_plot: In 20th-century colonial Kenya, a Danish baroness/plantation owner has a passionate love affair with a free-spirited big-game hunter.

91.movie_plot: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

163.movie_plot: In 1988, Earth makes the first contact with an alien civilization. In 1991, these aliens, known as Newcomers, slowly begin to be integrated into human society after three years of quarantine.

143.movie_plot: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and so restore order to his world.

11.movie_plot: Selfish yuppie Charlie Babbitt's father left a fortune to his savant brother Raymond and a pittance to Charlie; they travel cross-country.

17.movie_plot: Federal Agent Eliot Ness sets out to stop Al Capone; because of rampant corruption, he assembles a small, hand-picked team.

57.movie_plot: A single mother and waitress, a misanthropic author, and a gay artist form an unlikely friendship after the artist is assaulted in a robbery.

109.movie_plot: Emma is a divorced woman with a teen-aged son who moves into a small town and tries to make a go of a horse ranch. Murphy is the widowed town druggist who steers business her way. Things ...

126.movie_plot: Robbie, a singer, and Julia, a waitress, are both engaged, but to the wrong people. Fortune intervenes to help them discover each other.

239.movie_plot: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.

119.movie_plot: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.

8.movie_plot: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazi Germans.

181.movie_plot: Merlin the magician helps Arthur Pendragon unite the Britons around the Round Table of Camelot, even as dark forces conspire to tear it apart.

82.movie_plot: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son, John Connor, from a more advanced cyborg.

117.movie_plot: Holden and Banky are comic book artists. Everything's going good for them until they meet Alyssa, also a comic book artist. Holden falls for her, but his hopes are crushed when he finds out she's a lesbian.

172.movie_plot: Inspector Clouseau is put on the case when the Pink Panther diamond is stolen, with the Phantom's trademark glove the only clue.

225.movie_plot: An altar boy is accused of murdering a priest, and the truth is buried several layers deep.

204.movie_plot: The story of three not so bright men who come up with a series of crazy schemes to get a friend out of jail.

49.movie_plot: A young soldier in Vietnam faces a moral crisis when confronted with the horrors of war and the duality of man.

171.movie_plot: A naive man is appointed to fill a vacancy in the United States Senate. His plans promptly collide with political corruption, but he doesn't back down.

60.movie_plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, Vietnam, Watergate, and other history unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

223.movie_plot: A loyal and dedicated Hong Kong inspector teams up with a reckless and loudmouthed LAPD detective to rescue the Chinese Consul's kidnapped daughter, while trying to arrest a dangerous crime lord along the way.

92.movie_plot: Three former parapsychology professors set up shop as a unique ghost removal service.

153.movie_plot: Dorothy, saved from a psychiatric experiment by a mysterious girl, is somehow called back to Oz when a vain witch and the Nome King destroy everything that makes the magical land beautiful.

26.movie_plot: A maverick dancer risks his career by performing an unusual routine and sets out to succeed with a new partner.

18.movie_plot: Military lawyer Lieutenant Daniel Kaffee defends Marines accused of murder. They contend they were acting under orders.

122.movie_plot: Two vicious step-siblings of an elite Manhattan prep school make a wager: to deflower the new headmaster's daughter before the start of term.

100.movie_plot: James Bond heads to stop a media mogul's plan to induce war between China and the UK in order to obtain exclusive global media coverage.

28.movie_plot: When his secret bride is executed for assaulting an English soldier who tried to rape her, Sir William Wallace begins a revolt against King Edward I of England.

160.movie_name: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home (1986)
160.movie_plot: To save Earth from an alien probe, Admiral James T. Kirk and his fugitive crew go back in time to San Francisco in 1986 to retrieve the only beings who can communicate with it: humpback whales.

235.movie_plot: A crew in Antarctica finds a neighboring camp destroyed and its crew dead. Whatever killed them is nowhere to be found, unless it's hidden in plain sight.

114.movie_plot: When a sports agent has a moral epiphany and is fired for expressing it, he decides to put his new philosophy to the test as an independent agent with the only athlete who stays with him and his former secretary.

212.movie_plot: Naive young Mormon Joe Young is recruited to act in porn movies.

197.movie_plot: When the crew of the Enterprise learn of a Federation conspiracy against the inhabitants of a unique planet, Captain Picard begins an open rebellion.

222.movie_plot: A man begins to suspect his neighbors are not what they appear to be and their secrets could be deadly.

149.movie_plot: Producers Max Bialystock and Leo Bloom make money by producing a sure-fire flop.

154.movie_plot: The staff of an army hospital in the Korean war find that laughter is the best way to deal with their situation.

250.movie_plot: The relationship between Sid Vicious, bassist for British punk group The Sex Pistols, and his girlfriend Nancy Spungen is portrayed.

61.movie_plot: Six unemployed steel workers form a male striptease act. The women cheer them on to go for "the full monty" - total nudity.

145.movie_plot: An American grandson of the infamous scientist, struggling to prove that he is not as insane as people believe, is invited to Transylvania, where he discovers the process that reanimates a dead body.

177.movie_plot: Riggs and Murtaugh are on the trail of South African diplomats who are using their immunity to engage in criminal activities.

66.movie_name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
66.movie_plot: When Dr. Henry Jones, Sr. suddenly goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, eminent archaeologist Dr. Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. must follow in his father's footsteps to stop the Nazis from getting their hands on the Holy Grail first.

72.movie_name: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid (1969)
72.movie_plot: Two Western bank/train robbers flee to Bolivia when the law gets too close.

56.movie_plot: Watch the story of history's greatest gladiator unfold with graphic violence and the passions of the women that love them. This is Spartacus.

132.movie_plot: Dr. Ellie Arroway, after years of searching, finds conclusive radio proof of extraterrestrial intelligence, sending plans for a mysterious machine.

6.movie_plot: Two 1990s teenage siblings find themselves in a 1950s sitcom where their influence begins to profoundly change that complacent world.

138.movie_plot: Con artists plan to fleece an eccentric family using an accomplice who claims to be their long-lost uncle.

43.movie_plot: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas is going to impact Earth in less than a month, N.A.S.A. recruits a misfit team of deep core drillers to save the planet.

201.movie_plot: A government researcher, sent to research the "menace" of wolves in the north, learns about the true beneficial and positive nature of the species.

45.movie_plot: Rocky Balboa, a small-time boxer, gets a supremely rare chance to fight heavy-weight champion Apollo Creed in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

78.movie_plot: A woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in postapocalyptic Australia in search for her home-land with the help of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshipper, and a drifter named Max.

208.movie_plot: The cross-country adventures of two good-hearted but incredibly stupid friends.

106.movie_plot: A right-wing folk singer becomes a corrupt politician and runs a crooked election campaign. Only one independent muck-raking reporter is trying to stop him.

96.movie_plot: A gentle man, with scissors for hands, is brought into a new community after living in isolation.

35.movie_plot: A weatherman finds himself inexplicably living the same day over and over again.

10.movie_plot: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

136.movie_plot: In an afterlife way station resembling a block of hotels, the lives of the recently-deceased are examined in a court-like setting.

221.movie_plot: Planet Spaceballs' President Skroob sends Lord Dark Helmet to steal planet Druidia's abundant supply of air to replenish their own, and only Lone Starr can stop them.

170.movie_plot: A selfish, cynical T.V. executive is haunted by three spirits bearing lessons on Christmas Eve.

110.movie_plot: A young man is reunited with a mermaid who saves him from drowning as a boy and falls in love not knowing who/what she is.

251.movie_name: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York (1992)
251.movie_plot: One year after Kevin was left home alone and had to defeat a pair of bumbling burglars, he accidentally finds himself in New York City, and the same criminals are not far behind.

77.movie_plot: John McClane, officer of the NYPD, tries to save his wife Holly Gennaro and several others that were taken hostage by German terrorist Hans Gruber during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

194.movie_plot: Brian is born on the original Christmas, in the stable next door. He spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.

75.movie_plot: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain with an unscrupulous sea-witch in order to meet a human prince on land.

76.movie_plot: After a space merchant vessel perceives an unknown transmission as a distress call, its landing on the source moon finds one of the crew attacked by a mysterious lifeform, and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

39.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back (1980)
39.movie_plot: After the rebels are overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda. His friends accept shelter from a questionable ally as Darth Vader hunts them in a plan to capture Luke.

107.movie_plot: Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the notion that he may have discovered love.

69.movie_plot: A mild-mannered chemist and an ex-con must lead the counterstrike when a rogue group of military men, led by a renegade general, threaten a nerve gas attack from Alcatraz against San Francisco.

147.movie_name: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb (1963)
147.movie_plot: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

4.movie_plot: A man afraid to fly must ensure that a plane lands safely after the pilots become sick.

213.movie_plot: A waterboy for a college football team discovers he has a unique tackling ability and becomes a member of the team.

58.movie_plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

29.movie_name: Close Encounters of the Third Kind (1977)
29.movie_plot: After an accidental encounter with otherworldly vessels, an ordinary man follows a series of psychic clues to the first scheduled meeting between representatives of Earth and visitors from the cosmos.

162.movie_plot: Humanity finds a mysterious, obviously artificial object buried beneath the Lunar surface and, with the intelligent computer H.A.L. 9000, sets off on a quest.

139.movie_plot: The scientist father of a teenage girl and boy accidentally shrinks his and two other neighborhood teens to the size of insects. Now the teens must fight diminutive dangers as the father searches for them.

202.movie_plot: Humans in a fascistic, militaristic future do battle with giant alien bugs in a fight for survival.

211.movie_plot: Kermit and his newfound friends trek across America to find success in Hollywood, but a frog legs merchant is after Kermit.

135.movie_plot: A father becomes worried when a local gangster befriends his son in the Bronx in the 1960s.

87.movie_name: South Park: Bigger, Longer and Uncut (1999)
87.movie_plot: When Cartman and his friends go see an R rated movie, they start swearing and their parents think that Canada is to blame.

196.movie_name: Beneath the Planet of the Apes (1970)
196.movie_plot: The sole survivor of an interplanetary rescue mission searches for the only survivor of the previous expedition. He discovers a planet ruled by apes and an underground city run by telepathic humans.

1.movie_plot: When a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

164.movie_plot: When love drive you Mad 2 the Max...

210.movie_plot: A film following the lives of two inner-city Chicago boys who struggle to become college basketball players on the road to going professional.

193.movie_plot: Jake Blues, just out from prison, puts together his old band to save the Catholic home where he and brother Elwood were raised.

64.movie_plot: In London, four very different people team up to commit armed robbery, then try to doublecross each other for the loot.

120.movie_plot: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action, while attempting to liberate a twelve-year-old prostitute.

167.movie_plot: When a group of trespassing seniors swim in a pool containing alien cocoons, they find themselves energized with youthful vigour.

104.movie_plot: Shortly before an election, a spin-doctor and a Hollywood producer join efforts to fabricate a war in order to cover up a Presidential sex scandal.

24.movie_plot: An all-out war looms when the discovery of a cure for mutations draws a line between the followers of Charles Xavier and those of Magneto.

148.movie_plot: As Earth is invaded by alien tripod fighting machines, one family fights for survival.

253.movie_plot: Two American college students on a walking tour of Britain are attacked by a werewolf that none of the locals will admit exists.

113.movie_plot: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

131.movie_plot: Two slacker friends try to promote their public-access cable show.

52.movie_plot: Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt lead by a seasoned US Marshall.

214.movie_plot: Two hard-partying brothers place an online ad to find the perfect dates for their sister's Hawaiian wedding. Hoping for a wild getaway, the boys instead find themselves out-hustled by an uncontrollable duo.

227.movie_plot: A small-time conman has torn loyalties between his estranged mother and new girlfriend--both of whom are high-stakes grifters with their own angles to play.

98.movie_plot: A man gets a chance to meet up with his dream girl from high school, even though his date with her back then was a complete disaster.

189.movie_plot: A blade runner must pursue and try to terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

25.movie_plot: After the death of a friend, a writer recounts a boyhood journey to find the body of a missing boy.

156.movie_plot: An incompetent, immature, and dimwitted heir to an auto parts factory must save the business to keep it out of the hands of his new, con-artist relatives and big business.

184.movie_plot: The life and career of a legendary comedian, Andy Kaufman.

233.movie_plot: A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation.

19.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace (1999)
19.movie_plot: Two Jedi Knights escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to claim their old glory.

93.movie_plot: A fast-track lawyer can't lie for 24 hours due to his son's birthday wish after he turns his son down for the last time.

51.movie_plot: CIA Analyst Jack Ryan is drawn into an illegal war fought by the US government against a Colombian drug cartel.

3.movie_plot: A high school wise guy is determined to have a day off from school, despite what the Principal thinks of that.

127.movie_plot: An epic mosaic of interrelated characters in search of love, forgiveness, and meaning in the San Fernando Valley.

95.movie_plot: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

21.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi (1983)
21.movie_plot: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy a more powerful Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.

180.movie_plot: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

134.movie_plot: Harry and Sally have known each other for years, and are very good friends, but they fear sex would ruin the friendship.

108.movie_plot: As students at the United States Navy's elite fighter weapons school compete to be best in the class, one daring young pilot learns a few things from a civilian instructor that are not taught in the classroom.

124.movie_plot: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.

146.movie_plot: The romantic tale of a sheltered uptown Cocker Spaniel dog and a streetwise downtown Mutt.

54.movie_plot: Two best friends set out on an adventure, but it soon turns around to a terrifying escape from being hunted by the police, as these two girls escape for the crimes they committed.

101.movie_plot: Armed with a license to kill, Secret Agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007, and must defeat a private banker to terrorists in a high stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, Montenegro, but things are not what they seem.

159.movie_name: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock (1984)
159.movie_plot: Admiral Kirk and his bridge crew risk their careers stealing the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Spock's body.

32.movie_plot: A police officer is brought out of suspended animation in prison to pursue an old ultra-violent nemesis who is loose in a non-violent future society.

205.movie_plot: Four teenage boys enter a pact to lose their virginity by prom night.

182.movie_plot: In the world ravaged by the greenhouse effect and overpopulation, an NYPD detective investigates the murder of a big company CEO.

244.movie_plot: A poor girl must choose between the affections of her doting childhood sweetheart and a rich but sensitive playboy.

89.movie_plot: As corruption grows in 1950s LA, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

218.movie_plot: Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to start a relationship with Lois Lane, unaware that three Kryptonian criminals he inadvertently released are conquering Earth.

242.movie_plot: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.

71.movie_plot: An exclusive golf course has to deal with a brash new member and a destructive dancing gopher.

240.movie_name: Escape from the Planet of the Apes (1971)
240.movie_plot: The world is shocked by the appearance of three talking chimpanzees, who arrived mysteriously in a U.S. spacecraft. They become the toast of society, but one man believes them to be a threat to the human race.

116.movie_plot: Hamlet, Prince of Denmark, returns home to find his father murdered and his mother remarrying the murderer, his uncle. Meanwhile, war is brewing.

188.movie_plot: A man is accidentally transported to 1300 A.D., where he must battle an army of the dead and retrieve the Necronomicon so he can return home.

166.movie_plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
